Hero.subheadline: Helping entrepreneurs and businesses launch high-impact software and websites.

About.title: About Me | Jesus Salinas
About.description: Based in Vancouver, I bring a solid background in Computing Science and Information Systems, combining traditional software engineering discipline with the exponential power of AI to deliver robust results in weeks, not months.

ValueProposition.title: Why Digital?
ValueProposition.headline: Power Your Business
ValueProposition.description: It's not just about having a website. It's about creating a digital asset that works for you.

credibility.title: Instant Credibility
credibility.desc: Your first impression is digital. Convert visitors into trust with a premium presence.

automation.title: Automation & Scale
automation.desc: Stop using spreadsheets. Systematize your operations and save hours every week.

global.title: Global Reach
global.desc: Your business open 24/7, without borders. Reach clients beyond your local area.

Services.title: Services
Services.headline: High-Impact Digital Products
Services.description: More than just building websites, I create digital assets designed to grow your business.

web_dev.title: Accelerated Web Dev
web_dev.desc: Modern websites built with Next.js and Tailwind. Fast, SEO-optimized, and beautiful.

saas.title: SaaS & Web Apps
saas.desc: Complex applications with authentication, databases (Supabase), and payments.

consulting.title: Technical Consulting
consulting.desc: Strategic advice on tech stack, AI integration, and digital transformation.

Portfolio.title: Portfolio
Portfolio.headline: Selected Work
Portfolio.description: A mix of complex web applications and high-impact marketing sites.

below_zero_app.title: Below Zero App
below_zero_app.description: A comprehensive SaaS platform for scientific refrigeration teams. Features real-time scheduling, QR code asset tracking, and automated invoicing for streamlined operations.

below_zero_site.title: below-zero.ca
below_zero_site.description: Corporate website for a leader in the installation and repair of scientific refrigeration equipment. Focused on SEO, lead generation, and high-performance loading speeds.

cynthia.title: cynthiamedrano.ca
cynthia.description: Professional services portfolio for a tax consultant. Features a clean, multilingual design with an integrated booking system to streamline client appointments and service inquiries.

Contact.title: Contact
Contact.headline: Ready to
Contact.description: Let's discuss your project. I reply within 24 hours.
